resources.string: Please, keep on your phone\'s internet connection and GPS.
Please, refrain from using mobile phones while crossing the road and while walking.
Please, look both ways before cross the road.
Please, try to walk on the right-hand side of the road.
Please, turn on your phone\'s location.
Please, turn on your phone\'s location.
Please, turn on your phone\'s internet connection and location.
Please, turn on your phone\'s internet connection.
Please, keep on your phone\'s internet connection and GPS. Click here for vehicle information.
Please, check your email. We sent an email with password recovery link.
Registration successful. Please, check your email to verify your account and sign in. We sent an email with verification link.

Dear user, your email is not verified. We sent an email with verification link when you registered. If this link not working or you face other problems please choose confirm button to send email again.
Sent email successfully . Please check your email to verify your account and sign in. We sent again an email with verification link.
Enter your account email and password to sign in. If you forget the password, click on the "forgot password?" option.
Enter a valid email and at least 6 character password to sign up. You will receive an email with an email verification link as soon as the sign up is complete.
Enter your account email to reset password. We will send an email with password reset link.
How many buses are active now you can see from here. To see the real time locations of active buses click the location button.
University buses marker is green bus icon. Red marker icon is your current location. Click the marker to open information window. For more information click the information window.

To see bus list click \'Transport Information\' option from navigation bar. Click on bus information summary to see details information of specific bus. You can see also current location of specific bus from here.
To give feedback or report choose \'Report and Feedback\' option from navigation bar. Give a title of your report or feedback and enter details information about your report or feedback.
